The details
After falling more than 2% in recent months, energy prices rose 0.4% in December.
Gasoline prices moved sideways after falling 6% in November, but this was offset by an
increase in electricity costs. Throughout 2023, food prices grew at a low and stable rate.

each affected industry. The impact of minimum wage

words, raising the wage floor has a meaningful economic
impact only if a sufficient number of workers are being paid
at or below the minimum hourly rate.
